verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"With one accord" within an upper room The faithful followers of Jesus met One was the hope of ev'ry waiting soul And on one object great each heart was set{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"With one accord" until the mighty gift Of pentecostal power was outpoured Then forth as witnesses possessed of God To preach the resurrection of the Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}"With one accord" within the house of God A hallelujah song is daily raised As with the voice of one from vocal hearts Christ Jesus' name is glorified and praised{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pour down Thy Spirit once again dear Lord Our cry goes up to Thee for "latter rain" Unite Thy people as the "heart of one" And pentecostal days shall come again{/lang-eng}
